summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganA burst of freshness for the eyes with AHAVA's Hyaluronic Acid-based Eye Cream to help reduce the look of fine lines, wrinkles, puffiness, and darkness. Infused with potent multi-weight Hyaluronic Acid together with AHAVA’s exclusive Osmoter™ activator, hydrating Dead Sea minerals
details: DetailsBenefitsLong lasting hydrationHelps reduce the look of fine linesHelps lessen fatigue signs (puffiness, dark circles)Plumps and softensEasily absorbedFragrance freeResearch Results97% of women indicated the eye zone feels hydrated and plumped throughout the day97% of women indicated saw improvement in their dark circles97% of women saw visible reduction in fine lines93% of women indicated improvement in puffinessKey IngredientsHyaluronic AcidOsmoter™ stimulates natural, own-to-skin production of hyaluronic acid, collagen, and other compounds and ensures your skin’s health, strength & youthful appearance.Item 2634774How To UseApply twice a day to clean eye area.IngredientsAqua (Mineral Spring Water), Glycerin, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe-Vera) Leaf Juice, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Isodecyl Neopentanoate, Isodecyl Isononanoate, Propanediol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Dimethicone, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Saccharide Isomerate, Phenoxyethanol, Octyldodecanol, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Octyldodecyl Xyloside, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polysorbate 60, Chlorphenesin, Caprylyl Glycol, Didecyldimonium Chloride, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Pentylene Glycol, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Gardenia Taitensis Flower Extract, Acmella Oleracea Extract, Allantoin, Albizia Julibrissin Bark Extract, Sigesbeckia Orientalis Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid Salt), Phoenix Dactylifera (Date) Fruit Extract, Dunaliella Salina (Dead Sea Alga) Extract, Maris Aqua (Dead Sea Water/Osmoter).
how_to_use: Apply twice a day to clean eye area.
